mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE(date), "%Y-%m-%d") AS date, count(*) as count FROM sensordata WHERE DATE(date) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE(date) <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY date;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE(date), "%Y-%m-%d") AS date, count(*) as count FROM sensordetectioncheck WHERE DATE(date) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE(date) <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY date;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE(date), "%Y-%m-%d") AS date, count(*) as count FROM tensorflowcheck WHERE DATE(date) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE(date) <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY date;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE(date), "%Y-%m-%d") AS date, count(*) as count FROM telecomcheck WHERE DATE(date) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE(date) <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY date;
